inputs.remark:
缺少 V4 (hearing aid fitting)。
V1 缺少 February 2003 数据。
V2 缺少患者访谈、IH/OHN 信息、8问评估。
V3 缺少重复听力图、损伤评级。

logic_summary: Added February 2003 audiometry data to V1.
Added Patient Interview, Employer/IH/OHN Report, and Work-Relatedness Assessment to V2.
Added Repeat Pure-tone audiometry and Impairment Rating to V3.
Added V4 for hearing aid fitting and outcome.

value.name: Pure-tone audiometry (February 2003)
value.result_summary: Thresholds indicated progressive high-frequency hearing loss; Third STS-A evident.

value.name: Patient Interview
value.result_summary: Reported gradual onset bilateral hearing loss, tinnitus, and difficulty in noise. History of unprotected occupational noise (jackhammering) and recreational noise (firearms).

value.name: Employer/IH/OHN Report
value.result_summary: Confirmed hazardous noise levels (up to 100 dBA) and lack of consistent hearing conservation program enrollment.

value.name: Work-Relatedness Assessment
value.result_summary: 8-question assessment confirmed hearing loss is consistent with NIHL, exposure occurred at work, and HPD use was inconsistent.

value.name: Impairment Rating (AAO-1979)
value.result_summary: 28.1% right ear, 18.8% left ear; 20.3% binaural impairment.

tests.name: Hearing Aid Fitting
tests.result_summary: Binaural programmable hearing aids dispensed 4 months post-claim. Patient reports excellent subjective benefit and full-time use.
